summary:
Ivermectin is a medicine used to kill parasites in people and animals. It was first made in 1975 and is now used to treat many infections, like lice, scabies, and river blindness. You can take it as a pill or apply it to your skin. It's very effective and belongs to a group of drugs called avermectins. Two scientists won a Nobel Prize for discovering it.

Even though some people say it can help with COVID-19, major health organizations disagree. They say there's no proof it works against the virus.
title: Ivermectin
